meanings.definition: To bring (a company or industry) back under state control.
meanings.sent1: The government is renationalizing the railway system to improve services for everyone.
meanings.sent2: After years of private ownership, the government is renationalizing the healthcare industry.
meanings.sent3: The idea of renationalizing the chocolate industry sounds like a sweet deal for chocolate lovers.
meanings.sent4: Renationalizing the energy sector is like bringing a powerful engine back under state control.
meanings.sent5: Renationalizing the airline industry will ensure fair prices and better services for travelers.

meanings.definition: To return (a previously privatized industry) to state ownership.
meanings.sent1: The government is renationalizing the telecommunications sector to ensure fair competition.
meanings.sent2: Renationalizing the water supply will help in regulating prices for consumers.
meanings.sent3: Imagine renationalizing the toy industry and having state-approved toys for everyone!
meanings.sent4: Renationalizing the internet service providers is like bringing the digital world back home.
meanings.sent5: The decision to renationalize the oil industry will have a significant impact on the economy.
